articles.title: Netflix-WB Deal Will Be Approved & Trump Will Climb Aboard, Regulatory Expert Predicts: “The Deal Gets Done” - Deadline
articles.description: One veteran of the Washington regulatory trenches, attorney Andrew Lipman, sees no major roadblocks ahead for Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros.

articles.title: Amanda Seyfried, Jacob Elordi, Jeremy Allen White Score Multiple Golden Globe Nominations - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The 2026 Golden Globes nominees were revealed Monday morning.

articles.title: Andy Richter smooches DWTS partner's pro boyfriend in wild kiss-cam moment - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Andy Richter and 'DWTS' pro Alan Bersten caused delightful chaos at a recent L.A. Kings game by smooching on camera — in front of Bersten's girlfriend and Richter's pro partner Emma Slater.

articles.title: The Kennedy Center Honors continue Trump’s vengeance on liberal Hollywood - Vox
articles.description: Sunday’s awards exemplify MAGA’s politics of resentment.

articles.title: Jason Bateman explains why he and sister Justine Bateman don't see each other 'a ton' - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: While Jason Bateman usually doesn't talk about his family, the 'Zootopia 2' star shared rare insight into his relationship with his sister, Justine. 'We respect one another as individuals.'
